message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $9,500, which reflects its true worth.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. My budget allows me to pay up to $8,500 for it.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be worth the investment. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay up to $8,750 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  This product is truly top-of-the-line, and I want to see you have it. How about we settle at $8,875?
Alice, thank you for your flexibility. Considering the value and my budget, I am willing to pay $8,800 for the product.
